options.a: it unlocks special features for more followers
options.b: to cross-promote your Facebook for more exposure

que5.question: **How many times should you post per day?**
**How should you maximize engagement when you are commenting on a post?**

options.a: Use one of the comments that Facebook suggests
options.b: Like, comment and DM each person that posts something in your niche
options.c: Follow the person (or join the group), like the post, leave a comment (with value), and comment under other people’s comments (a thread)
